name: Tumblr Nav Go Away
description:
That "Navigator" is now (March 31st, 2015) displayed *for each post*, leaving even less space for tags.
This fix removes it from the posts, because it simply doesn't belong there. This fix does NOT remove the "Navigator" button in the top row.

user.name: Mike Gebirge
user.about: I'm just some tumblr user that is annoyed by tumblr's shortcomings that even I can fix in a few minutes. So here they are, a few of them. For updates, follow http://kedaiyis-fixes.tumblr.com/
